description: Using enumeration (numbered lists, bullets) in the Danger/Safety section. This signals systematic documentation of safety concerns.

recommendations.critical: Use enumeration in your Danger/Safety section to list threats systematically.
recommendations.rationale: Enumeration in key argument sections signals thoroughness. 90.0% grant rate when enumeration is used in Danger/Safety vs 85% without.
recommendations.insight: Enumeration in SPECIFIC argument sections (not just anywhere) is predictive.

suggestions: List threats systematically using numbered lists or bullets
Aim for 3+ enumerated threats for thoroughness
